mapper.select: select a.*, c.cust_name agentName, d.cust_name merchantName, e.user_name auditUserName from td_agent_sign_merchant a left join td_cust_info c on a.agent_id = c.cust_id left join td_cust_info d on a.merchant_id = d.cust_id left join sys_user e on a.audit_userId = e.user_id where merchant_id = #{custId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select t.*, u.mobile, u.email, u.state merchantState, f.fee_code from td_cust_info t left join TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO u on u.cust_Id = t.cust_Id left join TD_CUST_FEE_RULE f on t.cust_Id = f.cust_Id where t.cust_id =#{custId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE td_agent_sign_merchant set sign_audit_status = '00',audit_userId = #{auditUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},memo = '' where merchant_id = #{custId,jdbcType = VARCHAR};
mapper.select: select SCAN_COPY_PATH from td_sign_merchant_scan_copy where merchant_ID = #{custId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
